contents.text: Welcome to Gorgias, your dedicated Shopify customer support helpdesk based in San Francisco.
For help with your Gorgias helpdesk on Shopify, press 1.
For technical assistance with integrations and setup, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Configure my Shopify integration so incoming orders generate support tickets.
I’m a veteran setting up my Shopify store; need help integrating Gorgias and automating ticket routing.
I need help configuring the Gorgias API integration with my Shopify store.
I need help connecting Gorgias to my Shopify store.
Assist me with configuring the Gorgias–Shopify integration for my store’s setup.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and account questions, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a billing specialist.

navigationGoals: Check last month's invoice and update the credit card on file.
I need to review my latest Gorgias invoice, clarify charges, and update my payment method on a fixed budget.
I want to clarify the line items and transaction details on my latest Gorgias invoice.
I have questions about my Gorgias invoice and billing.
Clarify a discrepancy on my latest Gorgias invoice.

contents.text: For new account inquiries and sales information, press 2.
For pricing, plans, and feature details, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for pricing information.

navigationGoals: Compare plan options and pricing to decide on an upgrade.
As a veteran small-business owner, I’d like details on Gorgias plans, pricing tiers, and any veteran discounts.
I’d like to compare the feature sets and rate limits across different Gorgias pricing tiers.
I’d like details on your subscription pricing and features.
Provide detailed pricing information on Gorgias subscription plans.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized demo or trial, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a representative to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo to see how Gorgias works with my store.
I’d like to schedule a personalized Gorgias demo to evaluate support workflows for my Shopify shop.
I need to schedule a personalized demo to evaluate Gorgias’s AI automation capabilities.
I want to schedule a live demo of Gorgias.
Schedule a personalized demo of Gorgias for feature evaluation.
